title: Hybrid Angel, Vol. 1
description: Teenager Aja Taylor is adjusting to the death of her father and a move to a new state. It seems she can't catch a break, when she's nearly killed twice in the same week. It gets even worse when she has an argument with the popular quarterback at her new school. With the help of a new love interest and her best friends, she has to figure out who is out to get her...or die trying.
author: Nickie Williams
